name: Shoegazer
description:
I decided to use the LÖVE Jam 2023 as an excuse to learn some new things. It's my first time using LÖVE2D and my first time using the Lua language.

As a result, my 'entry' is nowhere near as complete as I'd planned (not that I'd really made any solid plans, tbh - the project folder for this is called 'HelloLove'!). In all, it was a couple of afternoons' work.

I was impressed by the audio functionality of LÖVE and decided to make a game based round its abilities. It fitted nicely into the theme of 'Connection', too.

What you CAN do is:

* Use the mouse to control the Amplifier.
* Avoid LPs!
* Hold the left mouse button, then release to 'shoot' a lead
* 'Vanish' LPs!
* Plug in FX pedals!!!

Connect as many FX pedals as you can. You'll find:

* Distortion!
* Flanger!
* Chorus!
* Echo!
* Ring Modulator!
* Tremolo!
* Reverb!

It's really not a complete and/or challenging game, though.

The guitar loop is by me, and I'm not a very skilled player, so sorry!

The graphics are also by me and I think I done alright with those :)

Thanks for looking!
